main event: A cigar-shaped, reddish colored object with no sound was sighted in Glenavon, California, on June 21, 1955.
interesting points: The object was at first thought to be a possible balloon or aircraft but was ultimately established as a radio contact with a UFO., The observation lasted for 15 minutes., The sighting occurred at night under foggy conditions with five miles visibility., The sighting was reported by a 26-year-old housewife., The report indicated the use of binoculars for the observation.
